A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thank you Disney for ruining my childhood hero Luke Skywalker and portraying him totally wrong than who he really was in the original saga. By the time he finally got some action he didn't even get to wield his green lightsaber and have this awesome fight to show how strong he really was. Disney has no f*cking idea what Star Wars really was and i truly hope they will get Rian Johnson off the next trilogy or it will suck even more when he doesn't have the great characters to rely on anymore. I give it 1 star because of the scene with Yoda..and please Disney stop with the stupid jokes!
